Content.title: Lau
Content.name: Lau
Content.bodyText:
I love the application, and see it having alot of potential. Don't lock it yourself into the native application.

Build a great web + mobile web application, and then talk to it using a native app. If you want open it up, so that other people can integrate with your app.

I'd be very interested in designing a little web front end, if you want something! ;)
